title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI is Breaking the SDLC: Here's How to Fix It (DVT103)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI正在打破软件开发生命周期：修复方法 (DVT103)
abstract: AI code generation is fast. Your ability to validate and ship it? Probably in need of an upgrade. Join Michael Webster, Principal Engineer at CircleCI, to learn about CircleCI’s AI engineering team’s experience deploying AI agents and coding assistants. Discover why 10x output is overwhelming traditional DevOps, which patterns unlock velocity without chaos, and why the solution isn't more tooling complexity, but smarter abstractions that make AI-generated code safer to ship. This presentation is brought to you by CircleCI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: AI 代码生成速度很快。但你验证和交付代码的能力呢？可能需要升级了。加入 CircleCI 首席工程师 Michael Webster，了解 CircleCI 的 AI 工程团队在部署 AI 代理和编码助手方面的经验。探索为什么 10 倍的输出量正在压垮传统 DevOps，哪些模式能够在不造成混乱的情况下释放速度，以及为什么解决方案不是更复杂的工具，而是让 AI 生成的代码更安全交付的智能抽象。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 CircleCI 提供。
